job_title: Senior Software Developer - Technical Services Systems
job_purpose: Design and deliver applications and tools used by Technical Services teams at Fortescue, contributing to the development and maintenance of in-house applications related to mining data processing and visualization.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Contribute to the ongoing development of the ecosystem of products
Develop features and improvements to products
Assist with deployment and QA of each release
Adopt software practices to produce high-quality, robust code
Contribute towards support and user engagements
required_qualifications: Extensive experience in developing large applications in React
Extensive experience in developing web services and worker services in C#/.NET
Experience in Amazon Web Services technologies (EC2, ECS, S3, SQS, Lambda) and/or in CDK or Terraform deployments
Experience in Snowflake or SQL, especially in stored procedures
Experience in data engineering or data management/pipeline frameworks, e.g., Apache Kafka
Experience with C++ and/or Unreal Engine visualization
Experience in developing mining/drilling applications, especially familiarity with mining/drilling domain and processes, or spatial data processing
company_details: Fortescue is leading the world with plans to decarbonize iron ore operations, harness renewable energy, and develop technology for global impact. The company values diversity and inclusivity, encouraging candidates from all backgrounds to apply.
